abort.unknown_authorize_url_generation: Unknown error generating an authorise URL.

auth.description:
To link your TelldusLive account:
 1. Click the link below
 2. Login to Telldus Live
 3. Authorise **{app_name}** (click **Yes**).
 4. Come back here and click **SUBMIT**.

 [Link TelldusLive account]({auth_url})
